type: Bay Fortune SCH Launching Ramp Reconstruction
short_summary: Reconstruction of launching ramp structure in Bay Fortune Small Craft Harbour, Prince Edward Island
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada has a requirement for the reconstruction of the existing launching ramp structure 503, Bay Fortune Small Craft Harbour, Fortune, Kings County, PEI. Work includes demolition, excavation, and installation of new steel toe protection, cast-in-place concrete slab panels, and rock fill. Estimated value is $100,001 to $500,000.
full_summary:
### Bay Fortune SCH Launching Ramp Reconstruction, Fortune, Kings County, PEI

#### Solicitation Information
* **Title:** Bay Fortune Small Craft Harbour Launching Ramp Reconstruction
* **Reference Number:** WS4149583571- Doc4160737242
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4149583571

#### Tender Details
* **Opening Date:** 2023-08-23
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-09-14T14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Estimated Value:** $100,001 to $500,000
* **Delivery Date:** 16 weeks after contract award

#### Services Required
PWGSC, on behalf of DFO, requires the reconstruction of existing launching ramp structure 503 at Bay Fortune Small Craft Harbour, Fortune, Kings County, PEI.  Work includes:

* Partial demolition and removal of existing launching ramp
* Excavation and removal of unsuitable sediments
* Installation of new steel toe protection and rock fill
* Placement of new cast-in-place concrete slab panels and rock materials
* Placement of new asphalt pavement

#### Trade Agreements
The contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:

* Gary Bryant, Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC)
* Email: [gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17247979?extsite=MTcyNDc5NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Bid Requirements
Bidders must meet the following requirements:

* Submit a proposal in response to this solicitation
* Comply with the terms and conditions of the contract
* Provide a bid security in accordance with the contract

#### Note: 
Please be aware that the tender closing date has expired and this solicitation is no longer open for bid.
